notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The following Scandinavians bought or sold real estate in Chicago recently:
Thore Thollakson to Albert Larsen: North Clark Street and Deming Place. Price, $1.
Jacob Johnson to Paul M. Burgland: Oak Place and Belmont Avenue. Price, $10.
Jacob Johnson to Paul M. Burgland: Wilton Avenue and Addison Street. Price, $10.
Victor F. Lawson to Elizabeth M. Bently: Burton Place. Price, $20,000.
Andrew Olesen to J. Schalin: Francisco and Schubert Avenues. Price, $7,000.
Sinion Hendriksen to California Avenue and Division Street. Price, $4,000.
Mike Root to August Hansen: Halsted Street and Milwaukee Avenue. Price, $1.
J. O'Brion to Jacob Davidson: 13th Place and Central Park Avenue. Price, $1,200.
